title: Medical Cannabis Company Allied Corp. Launches E-Commerce Platform
text:
KELOWNA, British Columbia, Oct. 23, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Allied Corp. ("Allied") (OTCQB: ALID), an international medical cannabis company focused on creating and providing targeted cannabinoid health solutions, is pleased to announce the launch of the Tactical Relief™ e-commerce platform (the “portal”). This is following the successful launch of the brand Tactical Relief™ that is under license with US-based affiliate: Savage Consulting, LLC. The Tactical Relief™ e-commerce portal will go live on October 23rd and is available at www.tacticalrelief.com . The highly customized e-commerce platform is a major step forward in Allied’s digital strategy that remains on-track for full global roll-out within Q4 2019.



The products offered via the e-commerce portal will cater to veteran and first responder markets across the United States. Customers will enjoy enhanced online personal services and a seamless ordering portal. The e-commerce site has responsive navigation with a “mobile first” approach, attractive design and rich media content to increase consumers’ engagement while shopping online.

Additional products including a variety of flavors and product categories for men and women will be brought to the Tactical Relief™ brand in Q4 2019. Additional features of the e-commerce site include: personalized chat services, such as the “virtual assistant” chat option and the possibility to book an appointment with an Allied professional or peer. The portal is fully integrated with social networks and local payment methods.

“This is a significant step forward for us," said Calum Hughes, CEO of Allied Corp. “Not only will the portal allow us to serve the veteran and first responder communities better but also help to build awareness of both our brand and our long term vision. The e-commerce site and our overall digital strategy will help us bring our therapeutic solutions to a larger market.”

Additional information about Allied Corp. can be found at www.allied.health .

On behalf of the Board,

Calum Hughes

Chief Executive Officer

About Allied Corp.

Allied Corp. is an international cannabis company with a mission to help people suffering from Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) by researching, creating and producing targeted cannabinoid health solutions. Allied Corp. uses an evidence-informed scientific approach to make this mission possible, through cutting-edge pharmaceutical research and development, innovative plant-based production and unique development of therapeutic products.
